\section*{SUMMARY : }

\subsection*{I.Report of the Scheduled changes : }


\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item The list of changes from 1.X to 2.X are resumed \doxyref{api\_\-change}{p.}{api_change}
\end{DoxyItemize}

\subsection*{II. How to compile }


\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item Compile :
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item follow gfal hello world tutorial to have an etics installation
\item cd CERNgfal
\item ./myautogen.sh
\end{DoxyItemize}
\item Compile tests :
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item Install python $>$=2.4
\item Install scons ( {\tt http://www.scons.org} )
\item execute \char`\"{}scons testing\char`\"{} in the CERNgfal dir
\end{DoxyItemize}
\item Clean builds :
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item scons -\/c 
\end{DoxyItemize}
\end{DoxyItemize}
